bibl.title: Between Loyalty and Treachery. P. Oxy. 2327 fr. 1 + 2(a) col. I = Simonides 21 West2 - Some Reconsiderations.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XXII, 2327 (= Pack2 1750). "We would have a unique example of song belonging to the poetic genre paidika, in which the boy becomes, quite unconventionally, the acting subject."
BARTOL Krystyna, Between Loyalty and Treachery. P. Oxy. 2327 fr. 1 + 2(a) col. I = Simonides 21 West2 - Some Reconsiderations.
